article.title: Welcome to the Maine U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the Maine U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
The U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized companies with their exporting strategies.

The Maine Export Assistance Center is part of an international network of domestic Export Assistance Centers and foreign offices in 154 cities in 80 countries worldwide. Our U.S. and international offices are directly linked through a global communications and information network which offers a unique and valuable service to Maine's exporters.

Together with our partners at the Maine International Trade Center (MITC), we can help your company to penetrate profitable markets throughout the globe!
article.seometadatatitle: Welcome to the Maine U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the Maine U.S. Export Assistance Center.
